title: BRIEF-LSE Says Proposed Acquisition Of Refinitiv On Track To Close In H2 2020
text:
BRIEF-LSE Says Proposed Acquisition Of Refinitiv On Track To Close In H2 2020

Economy 1 hour ago (Oct 08, 2019 04:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-LSE Says Proposed Acquisition Of Refinitiv On Track To Close In H2 2020 Oct 8 (Reuters) - London Stock Exchange Group PLC : * STATEMENT RE HKEX WITHDRAWAL * BOARD NOTES ANNOUNCEMENT MADE BY HKEX THAT IT DOES NOT INTEND TO MAKE AN OFFER FOR LSEG * PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF REFINITIV REMAINS ON TRACK TO CLOSE IN H2 2020 * SHAREHOLDER APPROVAL FOR PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF REFINITIV EXPECTED TO BE SOUGHT AT EXTRAORDINARY GENERAL MEETING IN NOVEMBER

BRIEF-LSE Says Proposed Acquisition Of Refinitiv On Track To Close In H2 2020
description: BRIEF-LSE Says Proposed Acquisition Of Refinitiv On Track To Close In H2 2020
